ch.bildspur.postfx

Class PostFXSupervisor

  • java.lang.Object
    • ch.bildspur.postfx.PostFXSupervisor
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Supervisor

    public class PostFXSupervisor
extends java.lang.Object
implements Supervisor
    Handles ping-pong pass buffer.
